      • printSystemInfo

        public static void printSystemInfo()
        Print the number of bodies in the system and the print the position of each one.

      • getForce

        private java.lang.Double[] getForce(PointMass p)
        Get the force acting on the current PointMass from another point mass. If the masses are coincident, returns null instead of div by 0 error.

      • getForce

        public java.lang.Double[] getForce()
        Get the sum of all forces acting on this point mass

      • calculateNextState

        public void calculateNextState(double h)
        Use Euler integration with a time step of h to get the next state

      • updateState

        public void updateState()
        Update the state of the point mass. This is used after the next state for every mass in the system has been calculated.
